summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of Tom Lambeth. The documents primarily consist of HSCA staff payroll records and related notifications from the Assassination Records Review Board. These records detail payroll authorizations, leave records, and notifications regarding the postponement of Social Security numbers for various HSCA staff members to protect their personal privacy. The documents cover a range of dates primarily in 1977 and 1995 and involve various HSCA employees.
significance: Based on the provided documents, Tom Lambeth has no significance in the JFK context.
